diff_act: 2.ensure there is a comprehensive record of all access-related activities
3.offer users a comprehensive overview of all recorded events within a case
4.allow users to review, analyze, and store the audit trails externally as needed

regen.absent_element: provision for users to view comprehensive overview of all recorded events within a case
regen.new_specification: System must offer users the ability to view an overview of all recorded events within a case for comprehensive review, analysis, and decision-making.
The system must log all access attempts classified as validly attempted violations to ensure comprehensive audit trail coverage.
The System must be able to capture and store validly attempted violations, ensuring a complete record of access attempts.

label: The System must be able to capture and store violations of cases where violations can validly be attempted.
absence: action of capturing and storing violations of cases where violations can validly be attempted
